name: Passenger's Unbelievable Mad Dash across Tarmac at Edinburgh Airport
description:
Disembarking our flight at Edinburgh having just arrived from Providence, Rhode Island, USA, one passenger suddenly decides to run off of the bus and across the tarmac, underneath the aircraft.  She is sent back by a baggage handler and given a stern talking to by the handling representative.


This video is being managed exclusively by Newsflare. To use this video for broadcast or in a commercial player go to: https://www.newsflare.com/video/167023/other/passengers-unbelievable-mad-dash-across-tarmac-at-edinburgh-airport or email: contact@newsflare.com or call: +44 (0) 20 3937 6280
